EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Event_Cloud-Native Customer Workshop_Shannon Ireland_Q119.Confirmation Clou
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud-Native Workshop Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Cloud-Native Workshop on Monday, January 14th.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Matt Hausmann at mhausmann@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mhausmann@pivotal.io]]>. We look forward to seeing you there.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/EMEA_Event_Cloud-NativeCustomerWorkshop_ShannonIreland_Q119.html]]>
